text.author: WARDCLERK,SIXTYEIGHT
text.content:
EIGHT,PATIENT has requested that he not be resuscitated in the event that
he goes into respiratory distress.   See attached scanned document for
patient's signature.

text.content:

reported patient acting inappropriately in a subsequent call.
